import React from "react"; const Testimonials = () => (

TESTIMONIALS

{/* Repeat for each testimonial */}

"Testimonial text..."

Client Name

Position, Company

"Testimonial text..."

Client Name

Position, Company

"Testimonial text..."

Client Name

Position, Company

); export default Testimonials;
